alert.note: Alert for Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 08 at 10:13PM EDT until May 11 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Michigan... East Branch Escanaba River at Gwinn affecting Marquette County. Chocolay River near Harvey affecting Marquette County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Tuesday afternoon at 215 PM EDT. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by excessive rainfall are occurring. * WHERE...East Branch Escanaba River at Gwinn. * WHEN...From this evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Low lying areas of Peter Nordeen Park begin to flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:40 PM EDT Monday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 3.2 feet Monday evening. - Action stage is 6.5 feet. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
